show_name: Please Save My Earth Music Image Video: Kin-Iro no Toki Nagarete (special)
other_title: Boku no Chikyū o Mamotte Music Image Video ~Kin-Iro no Toki Nasarete~ (Japanese)
Please Save My Earth - The Passing of the Golden Age
ぼくの地球を守って Music Image Video ～金色の時 流されて～ (Japanese)
plot: A compilation of both recycled animation from the OAV series, and new animation of scenes from the manga that take place before and after the events of the OAVs.
